Menace
[i]Mind Reader[/i] – When Satori enters, for each opponent, that player reveals their hand and you investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Clue: Exile target card from an opponent’s graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and mana of any type may be spent to cast it.
